remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现接口返回的值属性。This implementation of the interface returns the value of the property. 值属性在视图状态中保持不变。The value of the property is persisted in the view state. 对象将实现但不支持`set`方法属性。The object implements but does not support the `set` method on the property. 使用此方法的所有尝试都将都返回异常。All attempts to use this method will return a exception.

span.span: An attempt to set the value is made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类仍然存在的值及其属性可以查看状态。The class persists the value of its property to view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个自定义控件，并使用一个.aspx 文件中从该控件显示的文本对象。The following code example creates a custom control and uses that control from within an .aspx file to display the text of a object. 获取自定义控件对象，并输出中的 text 属性及其`Render`方法。The custom control obtains a object and outputs the text property in its `Render` method. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl/CS/mydataboundliteralcontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl/VB/mydataboundliteralcontrol.vb#1)] 您可以编译使用 Visual Basic 编译器 (vbc.exe) 或 C# 编译器 (csc.exe) 控件。You can compile the control with the Visual Basic Compiler (vbc.exe) or C# Compiler (csc.exe). 必须将生成的.dll 文件放在 Web 项目的 Bin 目录中，如下面的代码示例中所示。You must place the resulting .dll file in the Bin directory of the Web project, as shown in the following code example. ```vb vbc /r:System.dll /r:System.Web.dll /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/bin/vb_myDataBoundLiteralControl.dll myDataBoundLiteralControl.vb ``` ```csharp csc /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/bin/cs_myDataBoundLiteralControl.dll myDataBoundLiteralControl.cs ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何注册和.aspx 文件中使用自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how the custom control is registered and used within an .aspx file. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl/CS/databoundform.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl/VB/databoundform.aspx#2)]
